snippet: At least 43 villagers and soldiers drowned in a southern town on Tuesday when torrents of water dumped by a powerful typhoon cascaded down a mountain.
abstract: At least 43 villagers and soldiers drown in New Bataan, Philippines, when torrents of water dumped by powerful typhoon cascade down mountain and engulf shelters.
lead_paragraph: At least 43 villagers and soldiers drowned in a southern town on Tuesday when torrents of water dumped by a powerful typhoon cascaded down a mountain.

headline.main: Philippines: Typhoon Death Toll Rises Past 100
headline.print_headline: Philippines: Typhoon Death Toll Rises Past 100
